summary:
## Metabolism: Powering Life's Processes

Metabolism is like the body's power plant, turning food into energy and building blocks for growth. It involves chemical reactions, helped by enzymes, that keep cells working, allow us to grow, and respond to our surroundings.

These reactions can build things up (anabolic) or break things down (catabolic).  Think of building proteins or breaking down sugar for energy.

Amazingly, many of these processes are similar in creatures as different as bacteria and elephants, showing how important and ancient they are.
title: Metabolism
